entry.title: RT rahat.eth: Some life stuff caught up to me so missed a couple days. To make up for it: I'll give away two a day for three days starting tomorrow be...
entry.summary: RT rahat.eth Some life stuff caught up to me so missed a couple days. To make up for it: I'll give away two a day for three days starting tomorrow before officially closing this. You can still submit or update your submission. rahat.eth: In December I am going to personally give away 10 @developer_dao memberships using my $Code token allocation. One way to get into Developer DAO is by owning 400 $Code Tokens. See thread below on how to enter, make sure you actually read through everything.
